website_summaries.verdict: Doesn't require a separate subwoofer to achieve the highest level of audio quality.
pros: Very simple design, as the subwoofer is built into the soundbar
Automatically adjusts the speaker's output to minimize effects of distortion
Plays high-quality audio smoothly with built-in pass-through technology
cons: Some people prefer a separate subwoofer

customer_reviews.title: Marginally better than the TV's speakers
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations reading various reviews of this product and reading the specifications. Not many soundbars out there with 9 speakers in this price range. I just purchased a recent 65" 8-series Samsung TV and was looking for a Samsung soundbar for better integration. I wasn't necessarily looking to have the loudest speaker, but wanted a higher fidelity sound for listening to music and watching movies. The installation was quick and seamless, but the sound was marginally better than the TV. I adjusted various settings, used different connections, wireless and wired, which made no difference. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Just want I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my space! Makes movies and theatrical shows sound wonderful and the Clear Speech option is great for late-night viewing at low volume to not disrupt others in the house.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: This sound bar is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is great. The bass is outstanding in my opinion even though other reviewers complained about it. I did buy a SWA-W700 because of the other reviewer complaints about the base. This sound bar connects perfectly with my Samsung 8500 curved monitor using Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar soaring above all others
customer_reviews.text: Samsung HW-MS6500 Sound+ Curved Premium Soundbar has amazing surround sound. Wi-Fi, HDMI or Bluetooth connection is amazingly easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bitvarda

customer_reviews.title: but still love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality unparalleled. Volume has to be turned up a bit further than I expected, but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is Poor
customer_reviews.text: The sound, especially the low end wad poor. The built in subwoofer, which I was excited about; was virtually impossible to hear any distinction when in the "on" mode. I was interested in this product because of the brand and supposedly built in subwoofer. This was a disappointing purchase, and was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Samsung TV "sounds better"
customer_reviews.text: Was not overly impressed with the sound quality that came from this "sound bar" upgrade. The sound quality coming from my Samsung television is sharper and crisper. The only time the sound bar prevails is at very high levels. On a positive note, the curve of the sound bar flows nicely with the curve of the tv screen. Looks great but only sounds ok......
customer_reviews.author: rajesh shah

customer_reviews.title: Needed a quality sound bar for my 65" curved Samsung TV without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sound bar. Easy to connect. Played right off the bat!!! You can tell the difference between the modes. Good range of volume. I was impressed. I was leaning towards a Bose, but at $600 plus, I figured I'd give this one a try and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Theotonio

customer_reviews.title: Connects nicely with Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to set up, connects nicely and disconnects when I use a Bluetooth headset. Not sure what the advantage is for being curved since it's too heavy to attach to the television, and a flat bar would be easier to attach to the wall. Also, the connection hardware is 18 inches apart.. why?? Ever heard of standard construction measurements being 16 inches on center??
customer_reviews.author: Pancoastp@Loves.to.read.Lots

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device.
customer_reviews.text: Sound wise it’s an awesome speaker. My only qualm with it is the in regards to the optical cable it came with. That was an absolute piece of crap! Fortunately I had one to spare and was able to use it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Barrios

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, easy setup and sounds great. I should have bought additional speakers for surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: Good Rich Sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy set-up with a good rich sound for a normal size space. If you have an oversized living or theater room you may need to add a sub-woofer
customer_reviews.author: CWO4

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this product. Good quality for the price. East to connect and use
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this sound bar. Great sound. Easy to install. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bedroom soundbar that puts off amazing sound and realy shines while playing games on my Xbox one x
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Although I feel it really shines with a good blu ray that. Sound was night and day compared to streaming. However I would suggest getting the supporting rear speakers if you want surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN T SEALY

customer_reviews.title: Sharp style and quality soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I used the sound bar for my 65 inch Samsung TV. Easy to connect and install. Soundbar has multiple sound settings. My favorite setting is Movie. Makes the sound project while still balancing the bass and clarity of when people talk.
customer_reviews.author: Andrez Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, that’s it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but the sound is not worth the money. Apparently Samsung was just after the looks.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great match to tv and great sound. takes up little space and adds so much to the experience.
customer_reviews.author: tMac

customer_reviews.title: Easy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my sound bar looks amazing and easy to set up, I have set my sound bar in the living room, it's a complete package with good base and surround sound..
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is really nice. Both the TV and BT music settings are amazing. The sound is full and clear, I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Dope soundbar to match the 65" curved tv we have.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect and use!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and a vast improvement over the TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: WiFi and BT don't appear on display to set up to connect. I had to use TV ARC..
customer_reviews.author: Michele Levy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is not better than the TV. Horrible product!!
customer_reviews.author: William P Ladd Jr

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE SOUND. VERY VERY SATISFIED.
customer_reviews.text: 12/25/18 - I recently used the WIFI connection. Works even better than hard wiring. I was playing a FPS with wireless rear speakers. I couldn’t believe my ears. I could hear bullets zipping past me as if I’m there. And the bullets dropping as if there in the living room. This soundbar, rear wireless speakers, and Xbox One X are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: samsung multiroom app incompatible with android 10
customer_reviews.text: to use this speaker as part of a sound system you need to use wifi settings and the samsung multiroom app. The samsung multiroom app for android phones is not compatitble with the latest android version 10. it is impossible to get samsung to work on updating the app so don't buy this as part of a wifi multi speaker setup.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Logan

customer_reviews.title: I love my soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: Got a new Samsung Soundbar+ on Cyber Monday. It works great and matches my 78in curved Samsung 7-series UHD TV .
customer_reviews.author: Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: ... for my samsung 55" 8500 curved and it sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6500 soundbar for my samsung 55" 8500 curved and it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Darien Murrell

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics Sound+ Premium Curved Soundbar (HW-MS6500/ZA)
product_meta.description: Sound+ Soundbars are simply beautiful. Samsung audio technologies deliver room-filling, home theater sound without the need for a separate subwoofer. Designed with streamlined wires and an elegant easy mount option, Sound+ becomes one with your TV and brings your entire cinematic experience together like never before.
feature_bullets: Hear consistently great sound anywhere in the room with tweeters that cover a much wider frequency range.
Increases the power and depth of bass with control that precisely coordinates the movement of each speaker.
Samsung's proprietary technology delivers deep and detailed bass by predicting sound distortion and automatically tuning the speaker's output before the distortion occurs.
Enhance the look and sound of your TV with the sleek design of the curved sound bar. The distinctive curved design blends seamlessly with your curved TV.
The OneRemote from select 2017 Samsung TVs can manage many of the Soundbar's functions through the TV UI.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
